#include <iostream>
#include <cstring>
#include <cstdio>
#include <algorithm>
#include <vector>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
	int T;
	scanf("%d", &T);
	while (T --)
	{
		int H, W, F;
		scanf("%d%d%d", &F, &H, &W);
		int ans = W;
		vector<int> all;
		all.push_back(0);
		all.push_back(W);
		for (int i = 0; i < F; ++ i)
		{
			int p;
			scanf("%d", &p);
			all.push_back(p);
		}
		sort(all.begin(), all.end());
		for (int i = 1; i < (int) all.size(); ++ i)
		{
			ans = min(ans, all[i] - all[i - 1]);
		}
		printf("%d\n", ans * H);
	}
}
